author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Subscribers are upset with a decision from Amazon Prime Video to cancel a critically acclaimed series after one season. The hit series, which combined both comedy and drama, has been axed without any plans for a second season even though the initial order called for one. This surprising turn of events was shared in a [...]

The post Amazon Prime Video Cancels Critically Acclaimed Series After One Season appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Amazon Prime Video Cancels Critically Acclaimed Series After One Season
